entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
